data.system_settings: iPhone 6s - iOS 11.4, iPad Air 2 - iOS 11.4.1 PB
data.actual_result: You see the no text channels page for some seconds before the new DM loads.
data.expected_result: You should see any loading page.
data.short_description: No text channel message when opening a new DM via push notification
data.steps_to_repro: - Close out of Discord (don't force close it) - Get a new direct message from an user that have never sent you any messages before - Click on the push notification caused by this user - Observe it
